narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
Applicant is ready to be licensed as a Class B dealer.
Identification requirements for dogs/ cats were explained to the applicant.  Dogs/cats must be identified with official
USDA identification within 30 days after license number is received. 
Applicant will be sending the license fee to the Regional office. 
    Send to:  USDA-APHIS-AC
                   920 Main Campus Dr. Suite 200
                   Raleigh, NC 27606 
An exit briefing was conducted with undersigned facility representative. 
NO regulated activities may be conducted until USDA license is issued.
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
